snippet: Arif Lohar, the Pakistani singer and exponent of Sufi music, brought his infectious performance to a sold-out crowd at Asia Society on Friday night.
abstract: Jon Pareles reviews Punjabi music performance by Pakistani singer Arif Lohar at Asia Society.
lead_paragraph: Arif Lohar, the Pakistani singer and exponent of Sufi music, brought his infectious performance to a sold-out crowd at Asia Society on Friday night.

headline.seo: Arif Lohar Performs at Asia Society
headline.main: Delivering Delirium, With Long Incantations and Hypnotic Beats
headline.print_headline: Delivering Delirium, With Long Incantations and Hypnotic Beats
